name: Lunar League (kalzme)
description:
Created for Mini Jam 130 (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-130-lunar)

The goal of the game is to stay in possession until your timer hits 10 seconds. However, when the other player is in possession your timer will go down.

CONTROLS: KEYBOARD:
    • Move - WASD or Arrow keys 
    • Dodge - Spacebar
    • Quit - Escape
CONTROLLER:
    • Move - Left analog/Dpad
    • Dodge - "A" (Xbox) or "X" (PS)
    • Quit - Start
POWERUPS: There are multiple powerups in the game:
    • SWITCH: both players switch place
    • TIME FREEZE: the timers freeze for a couple of seconds
    • SPEED UP: gain speed for a couple of seconds 
CREDITS: Assets:
    • Planets/moon/etc. - https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator
    • Background - https://deep-fold.itch.io/space-background-generator
    • Some icons - https://www.kenney.nl/
Music:
    • Ludum Dare 38 - Track 2 by Abstraction (http://www.abstractionmusic.com/)
